apps.name: Maze Builder
apps.description: Generate and solve mazes with different algorithms. Watch as the computer finds its way through the paths you create!

apps.name: Snake Classic
apps.description: The classic Snake game with a modern twist. Collect food, grow longer, and try not to hit the walls or yourself!

apps.name: Todo Master
apps.description: A beautiful and intuitive todo list application to help you stay organized and productive throughout your day.

apps.name: Memory Match
apps.description: Test your memory with this card matching game. Find all pairs before time runs out!

apps.name: Weather Dashboard
apps.description: Check current weather conditions and forecast for any location around the world with a clean, intuitive interface.

apps.name: Live Code Editor
apps.description: A real-time code editor with syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages. Great for quick prototyping!
